changeSet.author: pierre.sandboge
changeSet.sql: delete from intyghandelse using intyghandelse, intyghandelse i1 where intyghandelse.id > i1.id and intyghandelse.correlationId = i1.correlationId and intyghandelse.type = 0 and i1.type = 0
delete from intyghandelse using intyghandelse, intyghandelse i1 where intyghandelse.id > i1.id and intyghandelse.correlationId = i1.correlationId and intyghandelse.type = 1 and i1.type = 1
